author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Manuela Gruendlinger "renderDateTimeField does not allow to clear input field" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4595
Input fields rendered with renderDateTimeField cannot be cleared, the old value is always restored.
